S04n293:1: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ saptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu sukṛtavicayaḥ prajñopāyābhyāṃ supariśodhitamārgaḥ susaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ suparibaddhamahāpraṇidhānaḥ adhiṣṭhitatathāgatādhiṣṭhānaḥ svakuśalamūlabalādhānaprāptaḥ tathāgatabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmānugatasaṃjñāmanasikāraḥ supariśodhitādhyāśayasaṃkalpa puṇyajñānabalābhyudgataḥ mahākaruṇākṛpābhyāṃ sarvasattvānutsṛṣṭaprayogaḥ apramāṇajñānapathānugataḥ,
S04n293:3: ajātatāṃ ca alakṣaṇatāṃ ca asaṃbhūtatāṃ ca avināśitāṃ ca aniṣṭhitatāṃ ca apravṛttitāṃ ca anabhinivṛttitāṃ ca abhāvasvabhāvatāṃ ca ādimadhyaparyavasānasamatāṃ ca tathatāvikalpasarvajñajñānapraveśatāṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtamavatarati |
S04n293:5: tatra bhavanto jinaputrā evaṃ kṣāntisamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sahapratilambhādacalāyā bodhisattvabhūmergambhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāramanuprāpto bhavati durājñātamasaṃbhinnaṃ sarvanimittāpagataṃ sarvasaṃjñāgrahavyāvṛttamapramāṇamasaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sarvavivekābhimukhībhūtam |
S04n293:6: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā bhikṣurṛddhimāṃścetovaśipāramitāprāpto'nupūrveṇa navamaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannaḥ sarveñjitamanyanāspanditavikalpāpagato bhavati,
S04n293:7: evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo'syā aṣṭamyā acalāyā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ sahapratilambhātsarvābhogavigato'nābhogadharmatāprāptaḥ kāyavākcittautsukyāpagataḥ sarveñjitamanyanāspanditavikalpāpagato vipākadharmatāvasthito bhavati |
S04n293:8: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato mahaughaprāptamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte |
S04n293:12: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvaścaturmahaughaprāptaṃ sattvakāyaṃ saṃjānāna uttaraṇābhiprāyaḥ sarvajñajñānābhisaṃbodhāya mahadvyāyāmautsukyamārabhate |
S04n293:13: sa mahāvīryārambhaprāptaḥ samanantaramanuprāpta imāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ sarvābhogavigato bhavati |
S04n293:14: tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ dvayasamudācāro vā nimittasamudācāro vā nābhāsībhavati |
S04n293:15: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā brahmalokopapattisthitaḥ kāmāvacarān kleśān na samudācarati,
S04n293:16: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvo'calāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ sarvacittamanovijñānasamudācārānna samudācarati |
S04n293:19: tasya khalu bho jinaputra bodhisattvasya evamimāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanugatasya pūrvapraṇidhānabalādhānasthitasya buddhā bhagavantastasmin dharmamukhasrotasi tathāgatajñānopasaṃhāraṃ kurvanti |
S04n293:20: evaṃ cainaṃ bruvanti - sādhu sādhu kulaputra |
S04n293:22: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra yā asmākaṃ daśabalacaturvaiśāradyabuddhadharmasamṛddhiḥ,
S04n293:27: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra kiṃcāpi tvayaivaṃ śāntavimokṣavihāro'nuprāptaḥ,
S04n293:28: imān punaraśāntānapraśāntān bālapṛthagjanān nānākleśasamudācāraprāptān vividhavitarkopahatamānasān samanvāhara, apekṣasva |
S04n293:29: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra pūrvapraṇidhānamanusmara sattvārthasaṃprāpaṇaṃ jñānamukhācintyatāṃ ca |
S04n293:30: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra eṣā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā |
S04n293:31: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmadhātusthitiḥ yadidaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ |
S04n293:34: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra prekṣasva tāvat tvamasmākaṃ kāyāpramāṇatāṃ ca jñānāpramāṇatāṃ ca buddhakṣetrāpramāṇatāṃ ca jñānābhinirhārāpramāṇatāṃ ca prabhāmaṇḍalāpramāṇatāṃ ca svarāṅgaviśuddhyapramāṇatāṃ ca |
S04n293:36: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ekastveṣa āloko yo'yaṃ sarvadharmanirvikalpālokaḥ |
S04n293:41: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra prekṣasva tāvaddaśasu dikṣu apramāṇakṣetratāṃ ca apramāṇasattvatāṃ ca apramāṇadharmavibhaktitāṃ ca |
S04n293:44: iti hi bho jinaputra te buddhā bhagavanta evaṃbhūmyanugatasya bodhisattvasya evaṃ pramukhānyaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni jñānābhinirhāramukhānyupasaṃharanti,
S04n293:48: te cedbuddhā bhagavantastaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ sarvajñajñānābhinirhāramukheṣu nāvatārayeyuḥ,
S04n293:50: tena khalu punarbuddhā bhagavantastasya bodhisattvasya tāvadapramāṇaṃ jñānābhinirhārakarmopasaṃharanti,
S04n293:51: yasyaikakṣaṇābhinirhṛtasya jñānābhinirhārakarmaṇaḥ sa pūrvakaḥ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvatsaptamīṃ bhūmipratiṣṭhāmupāgata ārambhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopeti,
S04n293:60: tathā hi bho jinaputra pūrvamekakāyābhinirhāratayā caryābhinirhāro'bhūt |
S04n293:61: imāṃ punarbhūmiṃ samārūḍhasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇakāyavibhaktito bodhisattvacaryābalaṃ samudāgacchati |
S04n293:62: apramāṇaghoṣābhinirhārataḥ apramāṇajñānābhinirhārataḥ apramāṇopapattyabhinirhārataḥ apramāṇakṣetrapariśodhanataḥ apramāṇasattvaparipācanataḥ apramāṇabuddhapūjopasthānataḥ apramāṇadharmakāyānubodhataḥ apramāṇābhijñābalādhānābhinirhārataḥ apramāṇaparṣanmaṇḍalavibhaktyabhinirhārataśca apramāṇānugatena kāyavāṅmanaskarmābhinirhāreṇa sarvabodhisattvacaryābalaṃ samudāgacchatyavicālyayogena |
S04n293:63: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra mahāsamudragāmī poto'prāpto mahāsamudraṃ sābhogavāhano bhavati |
S04n293:64: sa eva samanantaramanuprāpto mahāsamudramanābhogavāhano vātamaṇḍalīpraṇīto yadekadivasena mahāsamudre kramate,
S04n293:66: evameva bho jinaputra bodhisattvaḥ susaṃbhṛtamahākuśalamūlasaṃbhāro mahāyānasamudāgamābhirūḍho mahābodhisattvacaryāsāgaramanuprāpto yadekamuhūrtena jñānānābhogatayā sarvajñajñānenākramati,
S04n293:67: tanna śakyaṃ pūrvakeṇa sābhogakarmaṇā kalpaśatasahasreṇāpi tāvadaprameyamanuprāptum ||
S04n293:68: tatra bho jinaputra bodhisattvo'ṣṭamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāpto mahatyā upāyakauśalyajñānābhinirhārānābhogaprasṛtayā bodhisattvabuddhyā sarvajñajñānaṃ vicārayan lokadhātusaṃbhavaṃ ca vicārayati,
S04n293:80: sa pṛthivīdhātuparīttatāṃ ca prajānāti mahadgatatāṃ ca...apramāṇatāṃ ca...vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti |
S04n293:85: mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti |
S04n293:87: asyāṃ ca lokadhātau yāvanti pṛthivīdhātoḥ paramāṇurajāṃsi tāni prajānāti |
S04n293:91: yāvantyo ratnavibhaktayo yāvanti ca ratnaparamāṇurajāṃsi tāni prajānāti |
S04n293:94: sa sattvānāṃ kāyaudārikatāṃ ca kāyasūkṣmatāṃ ca kāyavibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti |
S04n293:101: sa evaṃ paramāṇurajaḥprabhedajñānāvatīrṇaḥ kāmadhātusaṃvartaṃ ca prajānāti |
S04n293:105: āmadhātuparīttatāṃ ca mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti |
S04n293:107: kāmadhātuparīttatāṃ ca mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti |
S04n293:109: traidhātukavicārajñānānugame svabhinirhṛtajñānālokaḥ sattvakāyaprabhedajñānakuśalaḥ kṣetrakāyavibhāgajñānakuśalaśca sattvopapattyāyatanābhinirhāre buddhiṃ cārayati |
S04n293:112: sa ekāmapi trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ spharitvā sattvānāṃ svakāyaṃ vibhaktyadhimuktiṣu tathatvāyopapattaye'bhinirharati pratibhāsajñānānugamanatayā (yathā sattvāḥ paripākaṃ gacchantyanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhivimuktaye) |
S04n293:113: evaṃ dve vā tisro vā catasro vā pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā yāvadanabhilāpyā api trisāhasramahāsāhasrā lokadhātūḥ spharitvā sattvānāṃ svakāyaṃ...peyālaṃ...pratibhāsajñānānugamanatayā |
S04n293:114: sa evaṃjñānasamanvāgato'syāṃ bhūmau supratiṣṭhita ekabuddhakṣetrācca na calati,
S04n293:115: anabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu ca pratibhāsaprāpto bhavati ||
S04n293:116: yādṛśī sattvānāṃ kāyavibhaktiśca varṇaliṅgasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhādhimuktyadhyāśayaśca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu teṣu ca parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu tatra tatra tathā tathā svakāyamādarśayati |
S04n293:136: iti hi bho jinaputra yāvanto'nabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāmupapattyāyatanādhimuktiprasarāsteṣu tathatvāya svakāyavibhaktimādarśayati ||
S04n293:137: sa sarvakāyavikalpāpagataḥ kāyasamatāprāptaḥ (taccāsya kāyasaṃdarśanamakṣūṇamavandhyaṃ ca sattvaparipākavinayāya)
S04n293:148: sa sattvānāṃ cittāśayābhinirhāramājñāya yathākālaparipākavinayānatikramādākāṅkṣan sattvakāyaṃ svakāyamadhitiṣṭhati |
S04n293:150: sa sattvānāṃ cittāśayābhinirhāramājñāya yaṃ yameva kāyaṃ yasmin yasmin kāye ākāṅkṣati,
S04n293:151: taṃ tameva kāyaṃ tasmin tasmin kāye (svakāyaṃ)
S04n293:159: mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca saṃkliṣṭatāṃ ca viśuddhatāṃ ca vyatyastatāṃ ca adhomūrdhatāṃ ca samatalatāṃ ca samavasaraṇatāṃ ca digjālavibhāgatāṃ ca prajānāti |
S04n293:161: evaṃ śrāvakākāyānāṃ pratyekabuddhakāyānāṃ bodhisattvakāyānāṃ vibhaktisaṃketaṃ prajānāti |
S04n293:173: yathāvannistīraṇatāṃ ca phalaprayogasaṃgṛhītatāṃ ca laukikalokottaravibhāgatāṃ ca triyāṇavyavasthānatāṃ ca sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇatāṃ ca nairyāṇikānairyāṇikatāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣatāṃ ca prajānāti |
S04n293:175: avikopanatāṃ ca avasthānasaṃketasaṃvṛttivyavasthānatāṃ ca sattvāsattvadharmavyavasthānatāṃ ca buddhadharmāryasaṃghavyavasthānatāṃ ca prajānāti |
S04n293:176: ākāśakāyānāmapramāṇatāṃ ca sarvatrānugatatāṃ ca aśarīratāṃ ca avitathānantatāṃ ca rūpakāyābhivyaktitāṃ ca prajānāti ||
S04n293:177: sa evaṃ kāyajñānābhinirhāraprāpto vaśavartī bhavati sarvasattveṣu |
S04n293:182: upapattivaśitāṃ ca sarvalokadhātūpapattisaṃdarśanatayā adhimuktisaṃdarśanatayā sarvalokadhātubuddhapratipūrṇasaṃdarśanatayā praṇidhānasaṃdarśanatayā yatheṣṭabuddhakṣetrakālābhisaṃbodhisaṃdarśanatayā ṛddhisaṃdarśanatayā sarvabuddhakṣetraṛddhivikurvaṇasaṃdarśanatayā dharmasaṃdarśanatayā anantamadhyadharmamukhālokasaṃdarśanatayā jñānasaṃdarśanatayā tathāgatabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmalakṣaṇānuvyañjanābhisaṃbodhisaṃdarśanatayā ||
S04n293:183: sa āsāṃ daśānāṃ bodhisattvavaśitānāṃ sahapratilambhena acintyajñānī ca bhavati atulyajñānī ca aprameyajñānī ca vipulajñānī ca asaṃhāryajñānī ca bhavati |
S04n293:184: tasyaivaṃbhūmyanugatasya evaṃ jñānasamanvāgatasya atyantāgavadyaḥ kāyakarmasamudācāraḥ pravartate,
S04n293:188: samāsato bho jinaputra bodhisattvasya imāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāptasya sarvabuddhadharmasamudānayanāya kāyavāṅmanaskarmasamudācāraḥ pravartate |
S04n293:189: sa evamimāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāptaḥ supratiṣṭhitāśayabalaśca bhavati sarvakleśasamudācārāpagatatvāt |
S04n293:201: iyaṃ bho jinaputra bodhisattvasya aṣṭamī jñānabhūmiracaletyucyate'saṃhāryatvāt |
S04n293:213: evaṃ jñānasvabhinirhṛtaḥ khalu punarbho jinaputra bodhisattvo buddhagotrānugato buddhaguṇaprabhāvabhāsitastathāgateryāpathacaryācāritrānugato buddhaviṣayābhimukhaḥ satatasamitaṃ svadhiṣṭhitatathāgatādhiṣṭhānaśca bhavati śakrabrahmalokapālapratyudgataśca vajrapāṇisatatānubaddhaśca samādhibalānutsṛṣṭaśca ca apramāṇakāyavibhaktyabhinirhṛtaśca sarvakāyacaryābalopagataśca mahābhijñāvipākapariniṣpannaśca anantasamādhivaśavartī ca apramāṇavyākaraṇapratyeṣakaśca yathāparipavakkajagadabhisaṃbodhinidarśakaśca bhavati |
S04n293:214: sa evaṃ jñānabhūmyanugato mahāyānamaṇḍalānupraviṣṭaḥ suvicāritamahājñānābhijñaḥ satatasamitaṃ pramuktaprajñālokaraśmirasaṅgadharmadhātupathāvatīrṇo lokadhātupathavibhaktikovidaḥ sarvākāraguṇasaṃdarśakaḥ svacittotpādavaśavartī pūrvāntāparāntasuvicitajñānaḥ sarvamārapathāvartanavivartanajñānānugataḥ sarvatathāgataviṣayagocarānupraviṣṭo'paryantalokadhātuprasareṣu bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratyapratyudāvartyayogena |
S04n293:216: tatra bho jinaputra acalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāpto bodhisattvaḥ satatasamitamaparyantatathāgatadarśanāvirahito bhavati samādhibalasvabhinirhṛtatvāt |
S04n293:218: sa ekaikasmin kalpe ekaikasmin lokadhātuprasare anekān buddhān,
S04n293:219: anekāni buddhaśatāni...peyālaṃ...anekāni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati sarvākārapūjābhinirhāraṃ copasaṃharati |
S04n293:222: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā tathāgatadharmakośaprāpto'saṃhāryo bhavati lokadhātuparipṛcchānirdeśeṣu |
S04n293:224: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra tadeva jātarūpaṃ supariniṣṭhitaṃ kuśalena karmāreṇa suparikarmakṛtaṃ jambūdvīpasvāminaḥ kaṇṭhe śirasi vā ābaddhamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavati sarvajambūdvīpakānāṃ sattvānāmābharaṇavikṛtaiḥ,
S04n293:225: evameva bho jinaputra asyāmacalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlānyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairyāvatsaptamībhūmisthitaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ |
S04n293:226: imāṃ ca bhūmimanugatasya bodhisattvasya mahatī prajñājñānaprabhā sattvānāṃ kleśatamāṃsi praśamayati suvibhaktajñānamukhābhinirhāratayā |
S04n293:227: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra sāhasriko mahābrahmā sāhasra lokadhātuṃ maitryā spharitvā prabhayāvabhāsayati,
S04n293:228: evameva bho jinaputra bodhisattvo'syāmacalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito yāvaddaśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn mahatā maitryavabhāsena spharitvā sattvānāṃ kleśaparidāhānanupūrveṇa praśamayati,
S04n293:230: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ praṇidhānapāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati,
S04n293:231: na ca pariśeṣāsu na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam |
S04n293:232: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya acalā nāma aṣṭamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ |
S04n293:234: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena mahābrahmā bhavati sāhasrādhipatiḥ |
S04n293:235: abhibhūranabhibhūto'nvarthadarśī vaśiprāptaḥ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvapāramitopadeśopasaṃhāreṣu asaṃhāryo lokadhātuvibhaktiparipṛcchānirdeśeṣu |
